Javascript Projects

I have two javascript items that I programmed from scratch. Just fun projects to kill time as a hobby.

  • Coin Flip - Click a button to flip the coin. It tallys up the number of times it lands on heads/tails. Also it calculates based off the amount of total flips and the number of times it landed on heads/tails, the percentage of times it landed on heads/tails.
  • Lottery Ticket - It costs $1 to play. You fill your wallet at a $5 increment. The winning number is in the green box and the white boxes are the numbers drawn to win. Prize money is added to your wallet automatically.
